# Unicode.Scalar.UnicodeScalarLiteralType

**Type Alias**

A type that represents a Unicode scalar literal.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias UnicodeScalarLiteralType = Unicode.Scalar
```

## Discussion

Valid types for `UnicodeScalarLiteralType` are `Unicode.Scalar`, `Character`, `String`, and `StaticString`.
title: Unicode.Scalar.UnicodeScalarLiteralType
